00057 WitreServer::WitreServer(TeleoReactor::xml_arg_type arg)
00058 :TeleoReactor(arg, false), graph::timelines_listener(arg),
00059  m_server(NULL), m_entry(NULL) {
00060   bool found;
00061   std::string config = m_log->use("witre.xml", found);
00062   if( !found )
00063     throw Error("Unable to locate witre.xml server configuration");
00064   try {
00065     boost::property_tree::ptree doc;
00066     read_xml(config, doc, xml::no_comments|xml::trim_whitespace);
00067 
00068     if( doc.empty() )
00069       throw Error("XML document "+config+" is empty");
00070     std::string arg = doc.get<std::string>("config.server");
00071     // end new code
00072 
00073     std::vector<std::string> args;
00074     boost::algorithm::split(args, arg, boost::algorithm::is_space());
00075 
00076     size_t argc = args.size();
00077     char **argv = NULL;
00078     argv = new char*[argc+1];
00079     argv[0] = strdup(config.c_str());
00080 
00081     for(size_t i=0; i<argc; ++i) {
00082       m_log->syslog("witre.server")<<"args["<<i<<"] "<<args[i];
00083       argv[i+1] = strdup(args[i].c_str());
00084       m_log->syslog("witre.server")<<"argv["<<i<<"] "<<argv[i+1];
00085     }
00086 
00087     m_server = new Wt::WServer(config);
00088 
00089     m_server->setServerConfiguration(argc, argv);
00090     if( NULL!=argv )
00091       delete[] argv;
00092 
00093     m_server->addEntryPoint(Wt::Application, boost::bind(createWitre, _1, this));
00094     if( !m_server->start() )
00095       throw Error("Unable to start the server");
00096 
00097   } catch(Wt::WServer::Exception const &e) {
00098     m_log->syslog("witre.server")<<"Server initialization ERROR : "<<e.what();
00099     throw Error(e.what());
00100   }
00101 }
00102 
00103 WitreServer::~WitreServer() {
00104   std::cerr<<"Deleting the server ???"<<std::endl;
00105   try {
00106     // destroy the server
00107     if( NULL!=m_server )
00108       delete m_server;
00109   } catch(Wt::WServer::Exception const &e) {
00110     m_log->syslog("WitreServer")<<"Error during shutdown : "<<e.what();
00111     throw Error(e.what());
00112   }
00113 }

00135 void WitreServer::connect(WitreApplication *client, const boost::function<void()>& function)
00136 {
00137     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00138     connections.push_back(Connection(Wt::WApplication::instance()->sessionId(), client, function));
00139 }
00140 
00141 void WitreServer::disconnect(WitreApplication *client)
00142 {
00143     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00144     for (unsigned i = 0; i < connections.size(); ++i) {
00145       if (connections[i].client == client) {
00146         connections.erase(connections.begin() + i);
00147         return;
00148           }
00149         }
00150 
00151         assert(false);
00152 }
00153 
00154 std::string WitreServer::getDependencies(std::string name)
00155 {
00156     WitrePaintSearch::GraphMap::iterator it;
00157     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00158     for(it=timelineGraph.begin(); it!=timelineGraph.end(); it++)
00159     {
00160         if((*it).first==name)
00161         {
00162             std::list<utils::Symbol>::iterator connection;
00163             std::stringstream msg;
00164             for(connection = (*it).second.connections.begin(); connection!=(*it).second.connections.end(); connection++)
00165             {
00166                 msg<<((connection!=(*it).second.connections.begin())?"&&":"")<<*connection;
00167             }
00168             return msg.str();
00169         }
00170     }
00171     return "";
00172 }
00173 
00174 /*
00175  * by deriving from graph::timelines_listener I can now be informed
00176  * from new timeline created in the agent at any time
00177  */
00178 void WitreServer::declared(details::timeline const &timeline) {
00179   if( !isExternal(timeline.name()) ) {
00180     // If I did not connect to it yet just create the connection
00181     use(timeline.name(), true, true); // as we do not have internal timlines this operation will always succeed
00182                                        //  the first boolean means that we may want to post goals
00183                                        //  the second boolean indicate if we want to be notified on plan updates
00184                                        //      (false for now)
00185     {
00186       // then add it to externalTimelines
00187       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00188       externalTimelines.push_back(timeline.name());
00189     }
00190 
00191     searchGraph();
00192     std::string name = timeline.name().str();
00193     //Updates each client with the new timeline name
00194     for (unsigned i = 0; i < connections.size(); ++i)
00195     {
00196         boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00197         Connection& c = connections[i];
00198         const boost::function<void(std::string)>& function(boost::bind(&WitreApplication::addTimeline, c.client, _1));
00199         Wt::WServer::instance()->post(c.sessionId, boost::bind(function, name) );
00200     }
00201   }
00202 }

00205  * conversely I am notified from timelines not being owned by any reactor
00206  * anymore ... but we do not have that much to do here for now
00207  */
00208 void WitreServer::undeclared(details::timeline const &timeline)
00209 {
00210

00213 void WitreServer::handleInit()
00214 {
00215     graph::timelines_listener::initialize();
00216     searchGraph();
00217 }
00218 
00219 //Getting the timeline Graph dependencies
00220 void WitreServer::searchGraph()
00221 {
00222     timelineGraph.clear();
00223     WitrePaintSearch vis2(timelineGraph);
00224     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00225     boost::depth_first_search(getGraph(), boost::visitor(vis2));
00226 }
00227 
00228 void WitreServer::notify(Observation const &obs)
00229 {
00230     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00231     time_t now = std::floor(tickToTime(getCurrentTick()));
00232     std::ostringstream oss;
00233     oss <<"<Token tick=\""<<getCurrentTick()<<"\" on=\""
00234         <<obs.object()<<"\" pred=\""<<obs.predicate()<<"\""
00235         <<" level=\""<<timelineGraph.find(obs.object())->second.level<<"\" "
00236         <<">"<<obs<<"</Token>";
00237     //Storing the observation
00238     observations.push(oss.str());
00239     /* This is where we notify all connected clients. */
00240     for (unsigned i = 0; i < connections.size(); ++i) {
00241         Connection& c = connections[i];
00242         c.client->addObs(oss.str());
00243         Wt::WServer::instance()->post(c.sessionId, c.function);
00244     }
00245 
00246 }
00247 
00248 bool WitreServer::synchronize()
00249 {
00250     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00251     time_t now = std::floor(tickToTime(getCurrentTick()+1));
00252     std::ostringstream oss;
00253     oss<<"<Token tick=\""<<getCurrentTick()<<"\" on=\"Tick\">"<<now<<"</Token>";
00254     //Storing ticks
00255     observations.push(oss.str());
00256     //Notify all connected clients
00257     for (unsigned i = 0; i < connections.size(); ++i) {
00258             Connection& c = connections[i];
00259             c.client->addObs(oss.str());
00260             Wt::WServer::instance()->post(c.sessionId, c.function );
00261     }
00262     return true;
00263 }
00264 
00265 void WitreServer::newPlanToken(goal_id const &t)
00266 {
00267     double ctime = getCurrentTick();
00268     planTokens.push_back(std::make_pair(ctime,t));
00269     string name = t->object().str();
00270 
00271     std::list<timed_goal::iterator> eraselist;
00272     timed_goal::iterator plan;
00273     for(plan = planTokens.begin(); plan!=planTokens.end(); ++plan)
00274     {
00275         double ptime = plan->first;
00276         if(ptime<ctime && plan->second->object()==name)
00277         {
00278             pastTokens.push_front((*plan));
00279             eraselist.push_back(plan);
00280         }
00281     }
00282     while(!eraselist.empty())
00283     {
00284         planTokens.erase(eraselist.front());
00285         eraselist.pop_front();
00286     }
00287 
00288     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00289     for (unsigned i = 0; i < connections.size(); ++i) {
00290         Connection& c = connections[i];
00291         const boost::function<void(const timed_goal&)>& function(boost::bind(&WitreApplication::newPlanToken, c.client, _1));
00292         Wt::WServer::instance()->post(c.sessionId, boost::bind(function, planTokens) );
00293     }
00294 
00295 }

00297 void WitreServer::cancelledPlanToken(goal_id const &t)

00299 
00300 }
00301 
00302 goal_id WitreServer::clientGoalPost(Goal const &g)
00303 {
00304     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00305     if(isExternal(g.object()))
00306     {
00307         goal_id id = postGoal(g);
00308         return id;
00309     }
00310     return goal_id();
00311 }
00312 
00313 TREX::transaction::Goal WitreServer::getGoal(std::string obs, std::string prd)
00314 {
00315     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00316     TREX::transaction::Goal clientGoal(obs,prd);
00317     return clientGoal;
00318 }

00323 bool WitreServer::attach(WitreReactor &r) {
00324   if( NULL!=m_entry )
00325     m_entry = &r;
00326   return &r==m_entry;
00327 }
00328 
00329 void WitreServer::detach(WitreReactor &r) {
00330   if( &r==m_entry )
00331     m_entry = NULL;
00332 }
